moves.1. e4 c5 2. d4 cxd4 3. c3 dxc3 4. Nxc3 e: Nc6 is more common, and better
moves.6. Bc4 Bc5 7. Nxe5 O-O 8. Nxf7: a bit early for this trade, castling is better here
moves.12... d6 13. Nd5+: Bg5  or exd6  are better here
moves.13... Ke6: he should have retreated his king to f7 by now, and has passed up multiple opportunities to do so
moves.16. Qe5: perhaps Qb5 , then castle?  Should lead to material gain
moves.17. Qe6+ Kc6 18. Qc4+ Kxd6 19. Qxb4+ Kc7: Ne6 IS far superior, but overall my comments are only advocating better winning moves.  Apart from move 8, very well played by Nick
